description: It's not a very big game and is basically like a visual novel with rpg elements (being able to walk around.) I would recommend for someone looking to pass the time.

Walk your 1 character to other characters, press enter, pick through various dialogue choices, move to the next character. Repeat, repeat, repeat, repeat, finish. No actions other than dialogue, a very limited map (3 buildings, 13 NPCs), very linear, zero replay value. Should be labeled a puzzle game, as no elements of traditional RPG exist within it. I'm hoping this was built as some computer science university student's class project, as I've seen better games developed by high school students on graphing calculators.
summary: 30 minutes of fun, if it were 1990

description: Loved it, it was great. Short and clunky but writing was pretty fun. Had to go back to the same people a few times to find a way forward with the story, but nothing insurmountable.
summary: Easy and short little PRG adventure

description: Usually I am not a fan of RPGs, but this is a wonderful adventure. Don't be phased by the retro graphics, this is worth continuing to the end. Big shout out to the developers of the open soure engine behind it!
Musique au top. Petit rpg a l'ancienne.Traduit partiellement en francais. a essayer

J'ai joué à ce jeu ça fait longtemps, et j'ai pris plaisir à le retrouver. Une enquête bien menée comme je les aime, un jeu de réflexion, pas de baston, après les effets spéciaux datent certainement un peu, mais ça fait partie des charmes du jeu, un peu désuet. j'ajoute une bonne musique qui est tout à fait dans l'ambiance. Mais à vous de découvrir...
